```{r echo=TRUE, warning=TRUE}
library(deisotoper)

input <- "http://fgcz-ms.uzh.ch/~cpanse/R257544/TP_HeLa_200ng.RData"

id <- c(1, 44);
index <- c(0, 0);

objN <- load(con <- url(input));
obj <- get(objN);

dot <-c();
  
for(i in 1:length(id)) {
  ms <- jCreateMS(obj[id[i]]);

  ims <- jCreateIMS(ms)

  dot <- c(dot, deisotoper::jGetDot(massspectrum = ms, isotopicmassspectrum = ims, index = index[i]));
}
```

```{r fig.retina=3, fig.width=8, fig.height=5}
library(DiagrammeR)
grViz(dot[1], width = 700)
```

```{r fig.retina=3, fig.width=8, fig.height=5}
library(DiagrammeR)
grViz(dot[2], width = 700)
```
